name: ElisaDBI
overview:
Elisa DBI is part of the Elisa Group providing digital performance measurement, website optimisation and digital marketing optimisation solutions to some of Europe’s most successful businesses.

Our Mission: To provide cutting-edge, best practice digital solutions that have a profound effect on our clients, our team and our community. The Elisa Group provides digital performance measurement, website optimisation and digital marketing optimisation solutions to some of Europe’s most successful businesses.

Our Mission: To provide cutting-edge, best practice digital solutions that have a profound effect on our clients, our team and our community.

Our brands:

-e-Interactive, serving southern Europe, specialises in the measurement and optimisation of digital marketing.

-Webanalytics.es, Spain’s leading web analytics and optimization company, also serving southern Europe.

-Elisa Dbi, serving the UK and northern Europe, Elisa DBI provides high-end web analytics, site optimization and consulting for online business. Specialties

Marketing online, Search Marketing, SEO, Website Optimisation, Social Media, E-commerce Solutions, Online Market Research, Web Analytics, SEM, mobile optimizations

acquisition.source_description: Havas Media Group acquires data analytics firm ElisaDBI
